mapper.select: SELECT a.work_order_no, a.business_type, a.policy_no, a.policy_item_no, a.risk_code, a.insured_no, a.insured_name, a.holder_no, a.holder_name, a.accept_by, a.accept_time, a.modify_by, a.modify_time, a.vip_flag, a.organ_code, a.status, a.create_by create_by1, a.create_time create_time1, a.update_by update_by1, a.update_time update_time1, b.call_center_id, b.channel_code, b.item_code, b.call_person_id, b.call_relation_by, b.priority_level, b.contacts_person_id, b.contacts_relation_by, b.call_center_id, b.email, b.organ_code, b.content, b.complaint_person_id, b.create_by create_by2, b.create_time create_time2, b.update_by update_by2, b.update_time update_time2 FROM work_order_accept a, accept_detail_info b, person_info c WHERE a.work_order_no = b.work_order_no and a.insured_no=c.person_id and a.business_type='信息需求' and a.status='01' and b.channel_code = #{channelCode} and b.item_code = #{itemCode} and a.accept_by = #{acceptBy} and a.accept_time = #{acceptTime} and a.accept_time between #{acceptTimeStart} and DATE_ADD(#{acceptTimeEnd},INTERVAL 1 DAY) and a.modify_by = #{modifyBy} and a.modify_time between #{modifyTimeStart} and DATE_ADD(#{modifyTimeEnd},INTERVAL 1 DAY) and a.work_order_no= #{workOrderNo} and a.policy_no = #{policyNo} and a.policy_item_no = #{policyItemNo} and a.insured_name like concat('%', #{insuredName}, '%') and a.holder_name like concat('%', #{holderName}, '%') and a.vip_flag = #{vipFlag} and a.organ_code = #{organCode} and b.priority_level = #{priorityLevel} and a.status = #{status} and c.id_number = #{idNumber} and c.mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone}

SELECT a.work_order_no, a.business_type, a.policy_no, a.policy_item_no, a.risk_code, a.insured_no, a.insured_name, a.holder_no, a.holder_name, a.accept_by, a.accept_time, a.modify_by, a.modify_time, a.vip_flag, a.organ_code, a.STATUS, a.create_by create_by1, a.create_time create_time1, a.update_by update_by1, a.update_time update_time1, b.channel_code, b.item_code, b.call_person_id, b.call_relation_by, b.priority_level, b.contacts_person_id, b.contacts_relation_by, b.call_center_id, b.email, b.organ_code, b.content, b.complaint_person_id, b.create_by , b.create_time create_time2, b.update_by update_by2, b.update_time update_time2, CASE
WHEN ( a.STATUS = '02' AND ( SELECT 1 FROM collaborative_from cf WHERE cf.STATUS = '02' AND cf.work_order_no = a.work_order_no ) = 1 ) THEN '06' ELSE a.STATUS END FROM work_order_accept a, accept_detail_info b, person_info c WHERE a.work_order_no NOT IN ( SELECT cf.work_order_no FROM collaborative_from cf WHERE cf.STATUS = '01' ) AND a.work_order_no = b.work_order_no AND a.insured_no = c.person_id AND a.business_type = '信息需求' AND a.STATUS = '02' and b.channel_code = #{channelCode} and b.item_code = #{itemCode} and a.accept_by = #{acceptBy} and a.accept_time = #{acceptTime} and a.accept_time between #{acceptTimeStart} and DATE_ADD(#{acceptTimeEnd},INTERVAL 1 DAY) and a.modify_by = #{modifyBy} and a.modify_time between #{modifyTimeStart} and DATE_ADD(#{modifyTimeEnd},INTERVAL 1 DAY) and a.work_order_no= #{workOrderNo} and a.policy_no = #{policyNo} and a.policy_item_no = #{policyItemNo} and a.insured_name like concat('%', #{insuredName}, '%') and a.holder_name like concat('%', #{holderName}, '%') and a.vip_flag = #{vipFlag} and a.organ_code = #{organCode} and b.priority_level = #{priorityLevel} and a.status = #{status} and c.id_number = #{idNumber} and c.mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone}

SELECT a.work_order_no, a.business_type, a.policy_no, a.policy_item_no, a.risk_code, a.insured_no, a.insured_name, a.holder_no, a.holder_name, a.accept_by, a.accept_time, a.modify_by, a.modify_time, a.vip_flag, a.organ_code, a.STATUS, a.create_by create_by1, a.create_time create_time1, a.update_by update_by1, a.update_time update_time1, b.channel_code, b.item_code, b.call_person_id, b.call_relation_by, b.priority_level, b.contacts_person_id, b.contacts_relation_by, b.call_center_id, b.email, b.organ_code, b.content, b.complaint_person_id, b.create_by create_by2, b.create_time create_time2, b.update_by update_by2, b.update_time update_time2 FROM work_order_accept a, accept_detail_info b, person_info c WHERE a.work_order_no = b.work_order_no and a.insured_no=c.person_id and a.business_type='信息需求' and a.work_order_no=#{workOrderNo}

SELECT a.work_order_no, a.call_center_id, a.call_person_id, a.call_relation_by, a.contacts_person_id, a.contacts_relation_by, a.email, a.organ_code, a.content, a.channel_code, a.priority_level FROM accept_detail_info a where a.work_order_no=#{workOrderNo}
mapper.update: update work_order_accept set status = '02' where status='01'and work_order_no = #{workOrderNo}
update work_order_accept set status = '05' where work_order_no = #{workOrderNo}
update work_order_accept set status = '06' where work_order_no = #{workOrderNo}
mapper.insert:
insert into work_order_accept
work_order_no, business_type, policy_no, policy_item_no, risk_code, insured_no, insured_name, holder_no, holder_name, accept_by, accept_time, modify_by, modify_time, vip_flag, organ_code, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,
#{workOrderNo}, #{businessType}, #{policyNo}, #{policyItemNo}, #{riskCode}, #{insuredNo}, #{insuredName}, #{holderNo}, #{holderName}, #{acceptBy}, #{acceptTime}, #{modifyBy}, #{modifyTime}, #{vipFlag}, #{organCode}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime},

insert into accept_detail_info
work_order_no, channel_code, item_code, call_person_id, call_relation_by, priority_level, contacts_person_id, contacts_relation_by, call_center_id, email, organ_code, content, complaint_person_id, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, prop0, prop1, prop2, prop3, prop4, prop5, prop6, prop7, prop8, prop9, prop10, prop11, prop12, prop13, prop14, prop15, prop16, prop17, prop18, prop19, prop20, prop21, prop22, prop23, prop24, prop25,
#{workOrderNo}, #{channelCode}, #{itemCode}, #{callPersonId}, #{callRelationBy}, #{priorityLevel}, #{contactsPersonId}, #{contactsRelationBy}, #{callCenterId}, #{email}, #{organCode}, #{content}, #{complaintPersonId}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{prop0}, #{prop1}, #{prop2}, #{prop3}, #{prop4}, #{prop5}, #{prop6}, #{prop7}, #{prop8}, #{prop9}, #{prop10}, #{prop11}, #{prop12}, #{prop13}, #{prop14}, #{prop15}, #{prop16}, #{prop17}, #{prop18}, #{prop19}, #{prop20}, #{prop21}, #{prop22}, #{prop23}, #{prop24}, #{prop25},

insert into person_info
person_id, name, sex, identity, mobile_phone, line_phone, home_phone, work_phone, language, email, id_number, id_type, birthday, address, other_customer_no, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time,
#{personId}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{identity}, #{mobilePhone}, #{linePhone}, #{homePhone}, #{workPhone}, #{language}, #{email}, #{idNumber}, #{idType}, #{birthday}, #{address}, #{otherCustomerNo}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime},

insert into flow_log
flow_id, work_order_no, sub_id, sub_type, link_code, operate_code, make_by, um_num, make_time, remarks, opinion, to_department, to_reason, attachment_flag, status, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time,
#{flowId}, #{workOrderNo}, #{subId}, #{subType}, #{linkCode}, #{operateCode}, #{makeBy}, #{umNum}, #{makeTime}, #{remarks}, #{opinion}, #{toDepartment}, #{toReason}, #{attachmentFlag}, #{status}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime},
